author: nickwilliams
msg: [LOG4J2-359] Changed the Servlet 3.0 auto-initializer so that it does nothing in a Servlet 2.5 or older application. This ensures behavioral consistency across containers. Thanks to Abhinav Shah for the patch this change was based on.

author: nickwilliams
msg: Cleaned up tests and cleared up documentation for the JPA appender following the resolution of EclipseLink issue #412454.
